summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 and 2, Block 13, Loyal Heights Division No. 6; Blocks 30, 31, 34, 35, 38 and 39, EXCEPT Lots 2 and 3, Block 35, all in T. Hanford's Addition; a portion of NE 1/4 of NE 1/4 of SW 1/4 of Section 27-24-4; and Lot 6, Block 51, D. T. Denny's 3rd Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-313 and 17-251, respectively.
